                                java.lang.Integer pid)
                         throws FaultException
        Get Details - Retrieves the details for a given package
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        pid - The id of the package you're looking for
        Returns:
        Returns a Map containing the details of the package
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if the errata corresponding to pid cannot be found.

      • findByNvrea

        public java.util.List<Package> findByNvrea(User loggedInUser,
                                           java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String version,
                                           java.lang.String release,
                                           java.lang.String epoch,
                                           java.lang.String archLabel)
        Lookup the details for packages with the given name, version, release, architecture label, and (optionally) epoch.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        name - - name of the package to search for
        version - - version of the package to search for
        release - release of the package to search for
        epoch - if set to something other than an empty string (""), strict matching will be used and the epoch string must be correct. If set to an empty string, if the epoch is null or there is only one NEVRA combination, it will be returned. (Empty string is recommended.)
        archLabel - the arch to search for
        Returns:
        the Package object requested

      • getPackageUrl

        public java.lang.String getPackageUrl(User loggedInUser,
                                      java.lang.Integer pid)
        get a package's download url
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        pid - the package id
        Returns:
        the url

                  throws java.io.IOException
        download a binary package
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        pid - the package id
        Returns:
        a byte array of the package
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an exception
